* County acreages outside WOH towns updated 6/2010 by T. Spies from NYSDOT town boundary data. All other town statistics generated 12/18/2002 by J. Tuscanes and T. Spies, NYCDEP BWS WLCP, from GIS data of best available municipal boundary data (hybrid of 1:4,800 county tax parcel data and 1:24,000 NYSDOT planimetric data) and 1:24,000 NYCDEP basin boundaries.
** Incorporated Village acreages are included in the underlying township's acreage.

***  Town boundaries for the Greene County Towns of Windham, Jewett, Cairo, and Durham follow the ridgeline of the same divide forming the Schoharie Basin Watershed Boundary. Due to differing scales of the two data sources used to generate these statistics, care should be taken to categorize those towns as being either fully inside (Windham and Jewett) or outside (Cairo and Durham) the NYC watershed, despite any "sliver" polygons generated along boundaries when combining the two GIS layers. Such slivers are only artifacts of the differing scales of the data, while the true town boundaries and the watershed divide are one and the same.
